pullrequest.title: Use new security group for SRC instances

content.raw: @iche033 : I've reverted back to the default security group, and set the new security group in the src rounds.  I had to do another change in simulators.js as the way it was you could not "replace" the default sgroup but instead just add extra groups.
content.html: @iche033 : I've reverted back to the default security group, and set the new security group in the src rounds. I had to do another change in simulators.js as the way it was you could not "replace" the default sgroup but instead just add extra groups.
